name: Cowcat: Meowdy Purtner
description:
The nefarious Boss Bomb has hijacked a train and has begun blowing up its carts one by one! Fortunately, Cowcat has boarded the train to save the day! Transfer through a series of challenging train cars to reach Boss Bomb before time runs out!  So strap up your boots, load your pistol, and ride away into the fun-set!

(Everything in this game is intentional. We have no regrets. c: )
